strapiPost.title: The Meteor Announces Fayetteville Location
strapiPost.content:
The Meteor, an all-day cafe and bike shop, announced its newest location is set to open in the spring of 2023 at Fayetteville’s South Yard. 

  • Munch: The Meteor serves an expansive selection of natural wine and craft beer, house-made baked goods, ingredient-driven food, and specialty coffee – including breakfast tacos, delectable burgers, and their famous sourdough-crust pizza. 
  • Peddle: Their bike shop offers a boutique retail environment that specializes in expert service and a carefully vetted selection of bikes, apparel, and accessories.  

Learn more about The Meteor HERE.
